{=!}Necromancy
Concept.text: Necromancy: {newline} Necromancy provides an extra dynamic alongside all of the above, the ability to ‘raise the dead. Having access to these magics means that you will have the option to raise the dead after battles, to bolster your armies, as well as visit specific locations (like {TOR_CURSEDLOCATIONS}) on the campaign map to recruit higher-tier undead units, such as wraiths. See ({TOR_RAISEDEAD})).{newline}

Concept.title: {=!}Spell Book
{=!}Spell Selection
Concept.text: When clicking on the spells inside the {TOR_SPELLBOOK} it is possible to add them to your selected combat spells, which will be usable the next time you are in combat. All other spells will not be visible during the fight, if no spell is selected then all spells are available.{newline}

Concept.title: {=!}Magic- and Holy Items
Concept.text: Usually with a purple background, magic items come with a special effect, which can be read by hovering over the blue icon at the bottom of a tooltip. Those magic items often amplify the wearer’s magical abilities or offer additional protection. The player can acquire them by visiting vendors around the Old World or winning battles against owners of such items.{newline}
